statusLine.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$inputData = [Console]::In.ReadToEnd() | ConvertFrom-Json; $modelName = $inputData.model.display_name; $projectName = if ($inputData.workspace.current_dir) { Split-Path -Path $inputData.workspace.current_dir -Leaf } else { 'Projet' }; Write-Output ('🤖 {0} | 📁 {1} | 🔢 Tokens actuels: Information non disponible | ⏰ Limite 5h: En attente' -f $modelName, $projectName)"
